message.content: This question requires some basic knowledge about peat and its uses. Peat is a type of soil that is rich in organic matter and is often used as a soil amendment. It has high water-holding capacity and can improve soil structure and drainage. Tomatoes, being plants, can benefit from the use of peat in the soil. Option (A) is incorrect because cats do not have any direct benefit from peat. Option (B) is incorrect because birds do not typically interact with soil in the same way that plants do. Option (D) is incorrect because dolphins are marine animals and do not interact with soil.
